item.title: Federal agent shoots Minneapolis man in leg after shovel attack, officials say
item.description: The incident comes as President Donald Trump threatens to use the Insurrection Act on protesters.

item.title: Iran judiciary denies plan to execute detained protester Erfan Soltani
item.description: The judiciary says Soltani is not facing charges carrying the death penalty, while a rights group reports that the execution has been "postponed".

item.title: European military personnel arrive in Greenland as Trump says US needs island
item.description: France says a 15-strong French military contingent has arrived and more forces will be there in the coming days.

item.title: Widespread delays hit Uganda election amid internet shutdown
item.description: The election is a rematch between Bobi Wine and Yoweri Museveni, who has been president for 40 years.

item.title: Boeing knew of flaw in part linked to UPS plane crash, US safety board report says
item.description: An aircraft that crashed in November had a structural flaw that had been identified by Boeing 15 years ago, investigators say.
